title: Which Hindi songs can you play in a loop before going to sleep? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mostly, I use to play.. Kahin to hogi wo (Jaane Tu Ya Jaane Na)Luka chuppi (Rang de basanti)Tu bin btaay (Rang de basanti)In Dino Dil Mera (Life In A Metro)Journey song (Piku)Maahi Ve (Highway)Alvida (Life in A Metro)Kuch Iss Tarah (Atif Aslam)Ye Dooriyan (Love Aaj Kal)Dil Kyun Ye Mera (Kites)Tum Ho (Rockstar)Main rahoon ya na rahoon (Armam Malik)Tere Bina (A. R. Rahman)Samjhawan (Arijit Singh)Saiyaan (Kailash Kher)Teri Dewaane (Kailash Kher)Noor E khuda (My Name Is Khan)Phir Mohabbat (Murder 2)Nazar Laaye (Raanjhana)Jeena Jeena (Badlapur)Humnava (Papon)Jiya Dhadak Dhadak Jaay (Rahat Fathe Ali Khan)Yaariyaan (Cocktail)Tera Chera (Adnan Sami)Tum Ho To (Rock On!!)And Many more… Enjoy : )

During betch my friends in Hostel where afraid of giving a new song they say ki Bhai tu is gane ki bi maa behen kr dena…they were really fed of me playing the same song whole day…………aur mere wajah se unhe apne hi fav songs se nafrat ho jate ti…... Whenever I get a new song I play it continuously for days even weeks until I didn't get the new song from somewhere…….some of these songs are…... Mein tenu samjhawa ji ( rahat fateh Ali khan)Preet ( koobsurat)Ranjha (queen)Akhein tere kitne hasii ( coke studio sung by mithoon) after drinkingSanu ek pal chain Na awe (nursat fateh Ali Khan )Lukka chupii ( R . D . B)Akhiyaaa ( from Punjabi album )One good advantage of having habit of listing song in loop is that u don't have to worry about changing track after end of song which is helpful during my studies also……….and I didn't get bored by these songs tiil now I still listin them in loop during day also……

Well before I sleep, usually I plug in my earphones & keep any track by Arijit Singh to get a good night’s sleep. But there are some songs that definitely give me the good sleep vibes & I always play them while sleeping. Satrangi Re - Arijit Singh (Gujju song)Tere sang yaara - Atif AslamKuchh iss tarah - Atif AslamGalliyan - Ankit TiwariGirl I need you - Arijit Singh, Meet brosAayat - Arijit SinghLaal ishq - Arijit Singh

While I going to bed to sleep ,here are the few songs that's make me sleep..Abhi Na jao chhod Kr k dil abhi bhara nhi(shreya ghoshal). Aaoge jab tum..( jab we met,flute instrumental by chirag agrawal)Mai pal do pal ka shayar hoon( Mukesh)Tum se hi( jab we met)Lamha lamha..( abhijeet, gangster)Jag ghumeya( sultan)Bulleya(sultan)Albela sajan..( hum dil de chuke sanam)Aao na( kyu ho gya Na)Thode badmash ..( shreya ghoshal)Hosh walo ko khabar kya...( Jagjeet Singh)Kabhi kabhi mere dil me( Mukesh)Mai tenu samjhawa ki..( Rahat fateh Ali...)Chalne lagi hai hawayein( Abhijeet)Kabhi yadoon me...( Abhijeet).and many more....

PHIR MOHABBAT – Murder 2 | Mohd. Irfan, Arijit Singh, Saim LYRICS:- Jab jab tere paas main aaya, Ik sukoon milaJise main tha bhoolta aaya, Wo wajood milaJab aaye mausam gham ke, Tujhe yaad kiyaHo… Jab sehme tanhapan se, Tujhe yaad kiyaHmm..dil… Sambhal ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tuDil yahin ruk jaa zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tu Aisa kyun kar hua janu naaMain janu naa o..o..Dil sambhal ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tuDil yahin ruk ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tu Jis raah pe, hai ghar teraAksar wahan se, haan main hoon guzraShayad yahin dil mein rahaTu mujh ko mil jaye, Kya pata… Kya hai yeh silsalaJanu naa, Main janu naaDil sambhal ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tuDil yahin ruk ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tu Kuch bhi nahi Jab darmayaanPhir kyun hai dil, tere hi khwaab buntaChaha ki de, tujhko bhulaPar yeh bhi mumkin ho na sakaa…Kya hai yeh maamla, Janu naaMain janu naa Dil sambhal ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tuDil yahin ruk ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tuDil sambhal ja zaraPhir mohabbat karne chala hai tu

Yeah .. If you ask me .. Then I can listen to any of the songs composed by A.R. Rehman sir , sung by Muhammad Rafi Saab, lucky Ali , ed sheeran, Shaina Twain, Christina Perry … in a loop. And some songs by Lata ji .. Like - “lag ja gale” , “aap ki nazron” .. Some by Kishore Saab like.. “Aa chal k tujhe” Some by Christina Perry.. “Penguins” “Arms” List is Longer than anything. ;) gunnite

Aahatein by Agnee. It’s a beautiful track they composed for Splitsvilla which is ironic because Splitsvilla stands for everything love is not. Agnee initially recorded an instrumental version and then added lyrics. You can play this version on loop before you go to sleep. It is very soothing and you will love it :)

Songs which i like to play when going to sleep are mostly sung by Arjit Singh or Atif Aslam etc .. 1.Jeena-jeena(Badlapur) 2.Phir laaya dil (Barfi) 3.Baatein ye kabhie na (Khaamoshiyan) 4.Bolna (Kapoor n sons) 5.Darmiyan(Jodi breakers) 6.Mai rahoon ya na rahoon(Armaan malik) 7.Moh-2 ke dhaage(Monali thakur) 8.Samjhawaan (HSKD) 9.Soch na sake(Airlift) 10.Tere bin

My playlist: They will blow you off Tu jaane na & Kuch iss tarah…..Atif AslamTujhe bhula diya ho……Mohit ChouhanNa aye ho,na aaoge…….PaponTu hi re……Hariharan and Kavita krishnamurtyNahi saamne ye alag baat hai.. HariharanKagaz ke do pankh leke….. Film:LooteraTeri laadki main……. Mtv coke studioMain jahan rahoon….. Rahat Fateh Ali khan and HimeshListen them once…..they are truly osssm and a lott more are there in my playlist.

Music is very subjective when it comes to choose a song. I will recommend you to listen low pitch instrumental or bollywood instrumental before sleep . There is great collection of instrumental songs available for you on net. You can start with Yiruma’s PianoMozart classicsZen and Chinese bamboo fluteAll these instrumentals will help you in two ways: You will sleep faster because there will be no lyrics to disturb you.Instrumental music always help is good dreaming

I think for me it would be Mann Mera from the movie Table No.21 sung by Gajendra Verma. It a song both beautifully written and sung. I totally can relate to the feel and music of this song. Surely one song thats repeat mode worthy. For sadder nights though I would choose Tujhe Bhula Diya. The song still gives me goosebumps.

Media devices are becoming greatest obstacle for sound and quiet sleep. So my choice just sleep and listen to songs early morning after you get up. But as you asked for songs to listen at sleeping time, here is my list of few songs Pehla nasha.. Naaraz savera hai (from sangarsh) Ab mujhe raat din (sonu nigam) Chupke se chupke se raat ki chadar taley
Tum se hi (jab we met) Tum mile reprise (tum mile) Door na ja (jannat) Rab ka shukrana (jannat 2) Kaun mera (special 26) Tum hi ho (Aashiqui 2) Tum ho to (rock on) Tum ho (rockstar) Sab tera (baaghi)
For me it has to be Nindya Re by Kavish. Its a coke studio song which is very peaceful, has a calming and soothing effect Here is the link  Enjoy the peace

Saawali Si Raat - Arijit Singh, Barfi It is the ultimate desi lullaby from recent years. Also listen to: Pashmina- Fitoor Hamdard- Ek Villain Suhaani Raat Dhal Chuki cover- Jonita Gandhi Jaane Kya Baat Hai cover - Prajakta Shukre

1. Bulleya - From Sultan movie. 2.Dhivera - From Bahubali Movie. 3.Pyaar manga hai... - Latest version. 4.Jag ghoomeya - From Sultan movie 5. Karan kudhya hai... - From Rustam 6. Tere aankhoo ke dariya ka. ..by Raha Fathy Ali Khan. And last but not the least.. 7. Kishori Kuch aisa intezam ho jaye.. by Needful ji maharaja.. (Devotional song).
The songs that I play are Toota jo kabhi tara (Atif Aslam)Tere Sang Yaara (Atif Aslam)Aayat (Arijit Singh)Aa bhi ja tu kahi se (Sonu Nigam)Mohe rang do laal (Shreya Ghoshal)

There are a lot in the queue , but starting from the most preferred one… 1.) Tum jo aaye (Rahat Fateh Ali Khan) 2.) Jal Pari (Aatif Aslam) 3.) Salamat (Arijit Singh) and many more ….. Well the third one is a newly added one ;)

Ae Dil Hai Mushkil - Arijit SinghDariya - Arko (Baar Baar Dekho)Tere Sang Yaara - RustomTu Hai - Mohenjo MohenjoGalliyan (Unplugged) - Ankit TiwariTum Hi Ho (Aashiqui 2) - Arijit SinghPhir Mohabbat (Murder 2) - Arijit,Mohd Irfan & Saim BhatMain Rahoon Ya Na Rahoon - Armaan MalikSaawali Si Raat - Arijit Singh

Listen to songs as per my mood… One song that you will always love while sleeping is Chandaniya (Lori Lori) from Rowdy Rathod you can download here https://ec-media.sndcdn.com/aHGe5bb85tyu.128.mp3?f10880d39085a94a0418a7ef69b03d522cd6dfee9399eeb9a522069e6afcbe3b153101eae8f6195ba79812c4bdc31bf92936658cbc679f2bdffe804d68038d46aab6f5ad9d
Generally playing old hindi songs which are Sing sung by muhammad rafi will be better cause they calm your mind from the day's hectic schedule
Jeena yeah marna yeha - meta ma'am joker Zindagi ki yehi reet hai - Mr India Ek pyaar ka nagma hai Aashiqui Aashiqui 2 movie songs
chanda chanda re kabhi to zameen par aa tu hi re nahi saanth hain mere pass hain yeh haseen vadiyaan
1] hothon se chu lo tum - jagjit singh 2] tujhe se naraz - cover by Sanam 3] aye dile nadan - lata mangeshkar
IKTARA  HEER  KUN FAYA KUN
